snippet: A credible vote this month in Egypt is desperately needed. The courts, the media and the bureaucracy are conspiring to make sure that doesn’t happen.
abstract: Editorial contends that Egypt desperately needs a competent government that is elected in a credible vote; urges the Obama administration to make clear to the presidential candidates that the United States will work with whoever wins, as long as they are committed to respecting the rights of all Egyptians.
lead_paragraph: A credible vote this month in Egypt is desperately needed. The courts, the media and the bureaucracy are conspiring to make sure that doesn’t happen.

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
